title: Voss' Silver Sword
content: Voss' Silver Sword Very Rare 4~16 Damage 1d10 (1d8)+2 Slashing+1d4Psychic Interplanar Slayer: This weapon grants a +1d4 bonus to Damage and Attack Rolls against githyanki, aberrations, fiends, and elementals. Weapon Enchantment +2 Wrathful Smite Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Heavy and granted in the gore of countless centuries, this prototype for the contemporary githyanki silver sword was wielded during their rebellion against the mind flayers who enslaved them. Longsword Versatile
